br.p: Delivery is from 10:30-11:30 at Southwest Bank - Custer; Red’s Grocery - Fay; Auditorium - Thomas

br.h3: For Important Information ~ Under Documents listed under IMPORTANT INFORMATION

img.alt: Download our new school app to find out what's happening at the district!

div.p:
SCHOOL MEAL DELIVERY
Weeks of Apr. 20-24/Apr. 27-May 1/May 4-8
10:30-11:30 am
Meals will be delivered as follows:
Mondays - 1 meal
Tuesday - 2 meals
Wednesday - 2 meals

PreK-6th Families- Thank you so much for coming out to pickup packets. We loved seeing so many of our students yesterday! As you begin, remember we are here to help and support you and your student. You can contact us through the teacher pages on our website or app.
To the Patrons of TFC Schools,

At this time I would like to give the TFC community an update on the progress of the construction project. All bids for the project have been awarded with the good news that the bids have come in well under the sum of the projections. This will enable the school to look at additional technology, and projects to enhance the original parameters of the project. Details of these projects have not been finalized at this time. Once they are updates will be forthcoming.

As most know the old gymnasium has be torn down to make way for the new elementary school. Construction on this building will keep moving forward, and foundation dirt work is progressing at this time. The Stadium, Track, and Field projects are set to begin soon and will hopefully be complete for the fall semester.

Due to school not being in session, the auditorium west side, (Band room, Vocal room, two regular classrooms and restrooms) will begin remodeling early, making them ready for the fall semester. This will allow us to have less of a displacement of classes and students starting the fall semester.

p.a: Event: LAST DAY OF SCHOOL - DISMISSED
